A random character is assaulted by terrible visions: incomprehensible creatures emerge from the walls, leaving bloody trails in their wake. The character gains D10 Stress and must pass a WIL check to avoid firing at will. (Other Divers must pass a DEX check or be hit.)
Strange growth covers this room, a moss-like tumor the color of rotten leaves that is somehow corroding even A-metal! Characters must make a DEX check or lose a random piece of gear.
A throne-shaped structure has been erected in the middle of this room, made entirely of different kinds of bones. A Perception check reveals a surprise among the bones: a human skull.
